name: HappyHippo
description:
Video about this game: COMING SOON on my channel.

Short description:

  • Help Hippo get to their family ushing against current of the river and dodging obstacles on their way;
  • Collect as many coins on your way as you can;
  • Compete with players all over the world through online leaderboard.

Story:
7 years ago, when I just started with gamedev and programming in general, I created a game as a homework for one of the classes. 

The tasks was: to create any game you want. Simple and clear. My teacher decided to give an example then. He said: "You can make whatever you want, even a game in which hippo dodges logs". 
In that moment I decided to make exactly this game to troll him (definitely not because of lack of imagination).

All those years later, I present to you a remake of this game: Happy Hippo!
Now with menus, music and even online leaderboard! So, go and beat my record (it's not that hard).

Technical:
This game is made using Godot Engine
Music from timbeek.com
Leaderboard is implemented using SilentWolf backend
